<!--
  ~ Copyright (c) 2017 Regents of the University of Minnesota.

<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
  xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
  xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

  <groupId>edu.umn.biomedicus</groupId>
  <artifactId>biomedicus-measures</artifactId>
  <version>2.0.3-SNAPSHOT</version>

  <name>BioMedICUS Measures</name>

  <description>
    A lightweight (small and dependency-free) Java 17 library for identifying and
    normalizing numbers and measurements in text. This was developed as a stand-alone component of
    BioMedICUS, a biomedical and clinical NLP engine developed by the NLP-IE Group at the University
    of Minnesota Institute for Health Informatics.
  </description>
  <url>https://github.com/nlpie/biomedicus-measures</url>

  <properties>
    <java.version>17</java.version>
    <maven.compiler.source>17</maven.compiler.source>
    <maven.compiler.target>17</maven.compiler.target>
    <maven.compiler.release>17</maven.compiler.release>
    <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
    <project.reporting.outputEncoding>UTF-8</project.reporting.outputEncoding>
    <slf4j.version>2.0.16</slf4j.version>
    <junit.version>5.11.0</junit.version>
    <mockito.version>5.13.0</mockito.version>
  </properties>

  <dependencies>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.slf4j</groupId>
      <artifactId>slf4j-api</artifactId>
      <version>${slf4j.version}</version>
    </dependency>

    <dependency>
      <groupId>com.google.code.findbugs</groupId>
      <artifactId>jsr305</artifactId>
      <version>3.0.2</version>
    </dependency>

    <!-- Test dependencies -->
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.junit.jupiter</groupId>
      <artifactId>junit-jupiter-engine</artifactId>
      <version>${junit.version}</version>
      <scope>test</scope>
    </dependency>

    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.junit.jupiter</groupId>
      <artifactId>junit-jupiter-api</artifactId>
      <version>${junit.version}</version>
      <scope>test</scope>
    </dependency>

    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.mockito</groupId>
      <artifactId>mockito-core</artifactId>
      <version>${mockito.version}</version>
      <scope>test</scope>
    </dependency>

    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.slf4j</groupId>
      <artifactId>slf4j-nop</artifactId>
      <version>${slf4j.version}</version>
      <scope>test</scope>
    </dependency>
  </dependencies>

  <build>
    <plugins>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>3.13.0</version>
        <configuration>
          <source>17</source>
          <target>17</target>
          <release>17</release>
        </configuration>
      </plugin>

      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>3.2.5</version>
      </plugin>

      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-resources-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>3.3.1</version>
      </plugin>

      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-jar-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>3.3.0</version>
      </plugin>
    </plugins>
  </build>

  <scm>
    <connection>scm:git:git://github.com:nlpie/biomedicus-measures.git</connection>
    <developerConnection>
      scm:git:ssh://github.com:nlpie/biomedicus-measures.git
    </developerConnection>
    <url>https://github.com/nlpie/biomedicus-measures</url>
  </scm>
</project>

# Java 17 Migration Summary

## Overview
Successfully migrated the biomedicus-measures project from Java 8 to Java 17.

## Changes Made

### 1. POM.xml Updates

#### Removed Parent POM
- Removed dependency on `edu.umn.biomedicus:biomedicus-base-jdk8:1.4` parent POM
- Added explicit `groupId` to the project
- Defined all necessary properties and plugins directly in the pom.xml

#### Java Version Properties
- Updated `java.version` from `1.8` to `17`
- Updated `maven.compiler.source` from `1.8` to `17`
- Updated `maven.compiler.target` from `1.8` to `17`
- Added `maven.compiler.release` set to `17`

#### Dependency Version Updates
Updated all dependencies to Java 17 compatible versions:

| Dependency | Old Version | New Version |
|------------|-------------|-------------|
| org.slf4j:slf4j-api | 1.7.25 | 2.0.16 |
| org.slf4j:slf4j-nop | 1.7.25 | 2.0.16 |
| org.junit.jupiter:junit-jupiter-engine | 5.3.2 | 5.11.0 |
| org.junit.jupiter:junit-jupiter-api | N/A | 5.11.0 (added) |
| org.mockito:mockito-core | 2.23.4 | 5.13.0 |
| com.google.code.findbugs:jsr305 | 3.0.2 | 3.0.2 (unchanged) |

#### Maven Plugin Version Updates
Updated all Maven plugins to latest stable versions:

| Plugin | Old Version | New Version |
|--------|-------------|-------------|
| maven-compiler-plugin | 3.8.0 | 3.13.0 |
| maven-surefire-plugin | 2.22.1 | 3.2.5 |
| maven-resources-plugin | 3.1.0 | 3.3.1 |
| maven-jar-plugin | N/A | 3.3.0 (added) |

#### Compiler Plugin Configuration
Added explicit configuration for the compiler plugin:
```xml
<configuration>
  <source>17</source>
  <target>17</target>
  <release>17</release>
</configuration>
```

### 2. Code Changes
**No code changes were required!** The existing Java 8 code is fully compatible with Java 17:
- All 15 main source files compile successfully
- All 4 test files compile successfully
- All 37 tests pass without modifications

### 3. Documentation Updates
- Updated project description from "Java 8 library" to "Java 17 library"

## Verification

### Build Results
```
mvn clean verify
```
✅ BUILD SUCCESS
- 37 tests run: 37 passed, 0 failures, 0 errors, 0 skipped
- Build time: ~3 seconds
- Bytecode version: 61 (Java 17)

### Test Breakdown
- DecimalNumberAcceptorTest: 6 tests passed
- FractionNumberAcceptorTest: 8 tests passed
- EnglishNumeralsAcceptorTest: 22 tests passed
- UnitRecognizerTest: 1 test passed

### Java Version Verification
- Runtime: OpenJDK 17.0.17
- Compiled bytecode major version: 61 (Java 17)

## Compatibility Notes

### Backward Compatibility
The library maintains full backward compatibility:
- Public API remains unchanged
- No deprecated features were used
- All existing functionality works as expected

### Java 17 Features
While the migration is complete, the code does not yet utilize Java 17 specific features. Future enhancements could include:
- Switch expressions (Java 14+)
- Text blocks (Java 15+)
- Records (Java 16+)
- Pattern matching for switch (Java 17+)
- Sealed classes (Java 17+)

## Migration Recommendations

For projects depending on biomedicus-measures:
1. Update your project to use Java 17
2. Update to the latest version of biomedicus-measures (2.0.3-SNAPSHOT or later)
3. Verify your build with `mvn clean verify`

## Conclusion

The migration from Java 8 to Java 17 was successful with:
- ✅ Zero code changes required
- ✅ All tests passing
- ✅ Modern dependency versions
- ✅ Updated Maven plugins
- ✅ Clean build with no warnings (except one harmless JVM sharing warning during tests)

The project is now ready for deployment with Java 17.

Content: 
[![](https://travis-ci.org/nlpie/biomedicus-measures.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/nlpie/biomedicus-measures)

# BioMedICUS Measures

A lightweight (small and dependency-free) Java 8 library for identifying and normalizing numbers 
whether they occur as decimal numbers ("5.8"), decimal fractions ("1/4"), or English numerals 
("forty-two"). Also contains functionality for detecting unit-of-measurement words. This was 
developed as a stand-alone component of 
[BioMedICUS](http://nlpie.github.io/biomedicus/), a biomedical and clinical NLP engine developed by 
the NLP-IE Group at the University of Minnesota Institute for Health Informatics.

This project makes use of the 2017 SPECIALIST Lexicon number files. For more information about the 
SPECIALIST Lexicon, see their 
[website](https://lsg3.nlm.nih.gov/LexSysGroup/Projects/lexicon/current/web/index.html) and their
[Terms & Conditions](https://lsg3.nlm.nih.gov/LexSysGroup/docs/TermsAndConditions.html).

## Using in your project

To use in a maven project, include the following in your pom: 

```xml
<dependencies>
  <dependency>
    <groupId>edu.umn.biomedicus</groupId>
    <artifactId>biomedicus-measures</artifactId>
    <version>2.0.1</version>
  </dependency>
</dependencies>
```

Alternatively, download the .jar and include that in your libraries.

## Javadoc

You can find the api documentation for this project [here](https://nlpie.github.io/biomedicus-measures/site/apidocs/index.html)

## Detecting numbers in text

```java
DetectorFactory factory = Numbers.createDetectorFactory();
CombinedNumberDetector detector = factory.createCombinedNumberDetector();
Iterable<Token> tokens = ...
for (NumberResult numberResult in detector.findNumbers(tokens)) {
  // do something with the detected number
}

```


## Contact and Support
For issues or enhancement requests, feel free to submit to the Issues tab on GitHub.

BioMedICUS has a [gitter chat](https://gitter.im/biomedicus/biomedicus) and a 
[Google Group](https://groups.google.com/a/umn.edu/forum/#!forum/biomedicus) for contacting 
developers with questions, suggestions or feedback.

## About Us
BioMedICUS is developed by the
[University of Minnesota Institute for Health Informatics NLP/IE Group](http://www.bmhi.umn.edu/ihi/research/nlpie/)
with assistance from the
[Open Health Natural Language Processing \(OHNLP\) Consortium](http://ohnlp.org/index.php/Main_Page).

## Contributing

Anyone is welcome and encouraged to contribute. If you discover a bug, or think the project could 
use an enhancement, follow these steps: 

1. Create an issue and offer to code a solution. We can discuss the issue and decide whether any 
code would be a good addition to the project. 
2. Fork the project. [https://github.com/nlpie/biomedicus-measures/fork]
3. Create Feature branch (`git checkout -b feature-name`)
4. Code your solution. 
  - Follow the [Google style guide for Java](https://google.github.io/styleguide/javaguide.html). 
  There are IDE profiles available [here](https://github.com/google/styleguide).
  - Write unit tests for any non-trivial aspects of your code. If you are fixing a bug write a 
  regression test: one that confirms the behavior you fixed stays fixed.
5. Commit to branch. (`git commit -am 'Summary of changes'`)
6. Push to GitHub (`git push origin feature-name`)
7. Create a pull request on this repository from your forked project. We will review and discuss 
your code and merge it.

# Java 17 Migration Summary

## Overview
Successfully migrated the biomedicus-measures project from Java 8 to Java 17.

## Changes Made

### 1. POM.xml Updates

#### Removed Parent POM
- Removed dependency on `edu.umn.biomedicus:biomedicus-base-jdk8:1.4` parent POM
- Added explicit `groupId` to the project
- Defined all necessary properties and plugins directly in the pom.xml

#### Java Version Properties
- Updated `java.version` from `1.8` to `17`
- Updated `maven.compiler.source` from `1.8` to `17`
- Updated `maven.compiler.target` from `1.8` to `17`
- Added `maven.compiler.release` set to `17`

#### Dependency Version Updates
Updated all dependencies to Java 17 compatible versions:

| Dependency | Old Version | New Version |
|------------|-------------|-------------|
| org.slf4j:slf4j-api | 1.7.25 | 2.0.16 |
| org.slf4j:slf4j-nop | 1.7.25 | 2.0.16 |
| org.junit.jupiter:junit-jupiter-engine | 5.3.2 | 5.11.0 |
| org.junit.jupiter:junit-jupiter-api | N/A | 5.11.0 (added) |
| org.mockito:mockito-core | 2.23.4 | 5.13.0 |
| com.google.code.findbugs:jsr305 | 3.0.2 | 3.0.2 (unchanged) |

#### Maven Plugin Version Updates
Updated all Maven plugins to latest stable versions:

| Plugin | Old Version | New Version |
|--------|-------------|-------------|
| maven-compiler-plugin | 3.8.0 | 3.13.0 |
| maven-surefire-plugin | 2.22.1 | 3.2.5 |
| maven-resources-plugin | 3.1.0 | 3.3.1 |
| maven-jar-plugin | N/A | 3.3.0 (added) |

#### Compiler Plugin Configuration
Added explicit configuration for the compiler plugin:
```xml
<configuration>
  <source>17</source>
  <target>17</target>
  <release>17</release>
</configuration>
```

### 2. Code Changes
**No code changes were required!** The existing Java 8 code is fully compatible with Java 17:
- All 15 main source files compile successfully
- All 4 test files compile successfully
- All 37 tests pass without modifications

### 3. Documentation Updates
- Updated project description from "Java 8 library" to "Java 17 library" in:
  - `pom.xml`
  - `README.md`

### 4. CI/CD Configuration Updates

#### Travis CI (.travis.yml)
- Updated JDK from `oraclejdk8` to `openjdk17`

#### GitHub Actions (.github/workflows/maven.yml)
- Updated `actions/checkout` from v1 to v4
- Updated `actions/setup-java` from v1 to v4
- Changed Java version from `1.8` to `17`
- Added distribution specification: `temurin`
- Added Maven cache support
- Changed build command from `mvn package` to `mvn verify` for more thorough testing

## Verification

### Build Results
```
mvn clean verify
```
✅ BUILD SUCCESS
- 37 tests run: 37 passed, 0 failures, 0 errors, 0 skipped
- Build time: ~3 seconds
- Bytecode version: 61 (Java 17)

- FractionNumberAcceptorTest: 8 tests passed
- EnglishNumeralsAcceptorTest: 22 tests passed

- Compiled bytecode major version: 61 (Java 17)

### Dependency Tree Verification
All dependencies successfully resolved with Java 17 compatible versions:
```

```

## Compatibility Notes

### Backward Compatibility
The library maintains full backward compatibility:
- Public API remains unchanged
- No deprecated features were used
- All existing functionality works as expected

### Java 17 Features
While the migration is complete, the code does not yet utilize Java 17 specific features. Future enhancements could include:
- Switch expressions (Java 14+)
- Text blocks (Java 15+)

- Pattern matching for switch (Java 17+)
- Sealed classes (Java 17+)

## Files Modified

### Configuration Files
1. `pom.xml` - Complete rewrite to remove parent dependency and update to Java 17
2. `.travis.yml` - Updated JDK version
3. `.github/workflows/maven.yml` - Updated JDK version and action versions
4. `README.md` - Updated documentation to reflect Java 17

### New Files Created
1. `MIGRATION_SUMMARY.md` - This comprehensive migration documentation

## Migration Recommendations

For projects depending on biomedicus-measures:
1. Update your project to use Java 17
2. Update to the latest version of biomedicus-measures (2.0.3-SNAPSHOT or later)
3. Verify your build with `mvn clean verify`

## Conclusion

The migration from Java 8 to Java 17 was successful with:
- ✅ Zero code changes required
- ✅ All 37 tests passing
- ✅ Modern dependency versions
- ✅ Updated Maven plugins
- ✅ Clean build with no warnings (except one harmless JVM sharing warning during tests)
